resources.string:
Hi, I'm Jay, I am an Software Developer with a background in Mechanical engineering. I have worked developing, deploying and maintaining internal full stack application for engineers using technologies such as Node, React, Vue, Postgres, OpenAPI and AWS Neptune.
 

I have experience working with global teams working through many different project phases from conducting user interviews, leading front-end development teams, creating and maintaining automated testing and automated deployment, to supporting active users with improvements and bug fixes.
 

I have 3 years of experience as a Mechanical Building Service Engineer designing, hotels, university buildings, theatres and airports. I have experience working in the UK and Middle East.
 

One of my main focuses is on D&I , I was part of Arup's LGBT+ network as well as co-chair of the Greater Manchester's Building Equality team, working together to drive LGBTQ+ inclusion in the industry.
 

I joined AND Digital in 2021 as a product developer.
